remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。 [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 处理事件，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。 handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托能够接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是元属性，这意味着它不能在运行时更改。This property is a meta property, which means it cannot be changed at runtime. 在运行时创建了属性实例之后，元属性不发生更改，因此该属性必须在设计时设置为文本值。Meta properties do not change after a property instance is created at runtime, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this instance is enabled for execution and validation.

value.span: 如果允许执行和验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if enabled for execution and validation; otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为 `false`，则会将所有子活动的该值也视为 `false`。If `false`, all child activities are treated as if this value is `false` for them also. 此属性是元属性，这意味着它不能在运行时更改。This property is a meta property, which means it cannot be changed at runtime. 在运行时创建了属性实例之后，元属性不发生更改，因此该属性必须在设计时设置为文本值。Meta properties do not change after a property instance is created at runtime, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于获取关于当前运行的活动和工作流的信息，还可用于从运行时环境获取服务。The is used to get information about the currently running activity and workflow, and is also used to obtain services from the runtime environment. 运行同步发生，当活动完成后或达到中间状态时，将控制返回到调用方。The running occurs synchronously, returning control to the caller when the activity is completed or reaches an intermediate state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 `Execute` 方法的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of the `Execute` method. 在此示例中，Outlook 电子邮件进行构造并发送。In this example, an Outlook email message is constructed and sent. 此示例摘自“Outlook 工作流向导”SDK 示例。This example is from the Outlook Workflow Wizard SDK sample. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Outlook 工作流向导示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408)。 [Outlook Workflow Wizard Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7b2ba92b-8456-43f3-87fc-184ffdec4408). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#98](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#98)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#98](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#98)]

summary.span: 获取或设置此实例的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of this instance.

summary.span: 此名称必须符合工作流项目中使用的编程语言的变量命名规则。

span.span: This name must conform to the variable naming convention of the programming language that is being used in the Workflow project.
The name of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此项的默认值为空字符串。Default value for this is the empty string. 此属性是元属性，这意味着它不能在运行时更改。This property is a meta property, which means it cannot be changed at runtime. 在运行时创建了属性实例之后，元属性不发生更改，因此该属性必须在设计时设置为文本值。Meta properties do not change after a property instance is created at runtime, so the property must be set to a literal value at design time. ## Examples 以下代码演示如何创建活动并将它们作为子级添加到复合活动，以及如何设置 的值。The following code shows how to create activities and add them as children to a composite activity and set the value for . 此代码示例摘自 ThrowWorkFlow.cs 文件中的“引发 SDK”示例。This code example is part of the Throw SDK sample and is from the ThrowWorkFlow.cs file. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [引发示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc)。 [Throw Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa5b9546-ec95-4e43-8337-20e26f8d71cc). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets11.cs#179)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets11.vb#179)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StatusChanged As EventHandler(Of ActivityExecutionStatusChangedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在运行中的 的 更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the of a running changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。 [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 当某个活动（活动 A）订阅其他活动（活动 B）的 `StatusChanged` 事件时，关联的 `Activity` 的 属性将引用被订阅的活动（活动 B），而关联的 `Sender` 对象将引用订阅活动（活动 A）的执行上下文。When an activity (Activity A) subscribes to a different activity's (Activity B) `StatusChanged` event, the `Activity` property of the associated refers to the activity subscribed to (Activity B), and the associated `Sender` object refers to the execution context of the subscribing activity (Activity A).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托能够接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, make sure to call the base class method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过解析对应的依赖属性，可以间接地访问此类型的每个公共属性和事件。You indirectly access each public property and event of this type by the resolution of a corresponding dependency property. 此依赖属性是名为 `XProperty` 或 `XEvent` 的公共静态字段，其中 X 是对应的属性。This dependency property is the public static field named `XProperty` or `XEvent`, where X is the corresponding property. [!INCLUDE[DependencyPropertyRemark](~/includes/dependencypropertyremark-md.md)]

span.span: The that provides the service.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，为活动提供由服务提供程序执行的反初始化。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, provides un-initialization by a service provider for the activity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使活动能够清理在初始化期间分配的资源。This method provides the activity with an opportunity to clean up resources allocated during initialization. 在确保活动实例不再执行任何其他操作时，调用 。 is called when an activity instance is guaranteed not to perform any more execution. 对于不实现 的活动，这在活动关闭时立即发生；如果从未执行过活动，则在工作流完成时发生。For activities that do not implement , this occurs immediately after the activity closes, or, if the activity never executed, at workflow completion. 对于 活动，这在补偿后或工作流完成时发生。For activities, this occurs either after compensation or at workflow completion.
